IntroSceneCinder: ^Customer: Hey hey ain’t that the Pizza Guy? THATS HEAT!!
^Cyrus: Woah hey, I take it you must be Cinder?
^Cinder: THE ONE AND ONLY!! We got a FIRE party goin on over here!!

c-0: ^Cinder: Hoho anything but! We’re setting the dance floor ablaze!
c-1: ^Cinder: With that Pizza, oh heck yeah! Come on in!
g-0: ^Cinder: Ey, hold on, you DID take the fire path to get here, eh? Kept the slices nice and toasty?

c-2: ^Cyrus: It looked easier, I figured I could do it quicker!
^Cinder: You know, good point. It’s all G man, we got enough fire here to get it back to well baked!
c-3: ^Cinder: My man! I KNEW I could count on Galactic Slice!

g-1: ^Phone: *Didi Doo Doo Didi Doo Doo Didi Doo Doo Dum*
^Cinder: Ey, what’s that Man? Some sorta tracking thingy?
^Cyrus: Ack, Company Call! That’s what the phone was for! I guess Tim has something to say, I shold get going…
^Cinder: Ahh, gotcha. Thanks so much man! Big tip for my man!
